features_zh: Sonnet 系列迄今最强升级：在编码、计算机使用（computer use）、长上下文推理、Agent 规划、知识工作与设计等方面全面提升；API 提供 1M token 上下文窗口（beta）；在 Claude.ai 默认模型，并保持与 Sonnet 4.5 相同定价。
features_en: Anthropic’s most capable Sonnet model yet: broad upgrades across coding, computer use, long-context reasoning, agent planning, knowledge work, and design; includes a 1M-token context window in beta on the API; becomes the default model on claude.ai with Sonnet 4.5 pricing.

features_zh: Gemini 3 系列升级后的“核心智能”模型，面向需要高级推理的复杂任务（如数据综合与复杂主题解释）；以预览版形式发布，并通过 Gemini API、Vertex AI、Gemini App 与 NotebookLM 等渠道逐步上线。
features_en: An upgraded core-intelligence Gemini 3-series model for complex tasks requiring advanced reasoning (e.g., synthesizing data and explaining complex topics); released in preview and rolling out via the Gemini API, Vertex AI, the Gemini app, and NotebookLM.

features_zh: 官方发布 Qwen3.5，并开源首个模型权重 Qwen3.5-397B-A17B（原生视觉-语言模型）。采用混合架构（线性注意力 Gated Delta Networks + 稀疏 MoE），总参数 397B、单次激活 17B，强调推理效率与成本；覆盖推理、编程、Agent 能力与多模态理解等；语言/方言支持从 119 扩展到 201。官方托管模型 Qwen3.5-Plus 通过阿里云 Model Studio 提供，默认 1M 上下文，并带内置工具与自适应工具调用。
features_en: Official release of Qwen3.5 with the first open-weight model Qwen3.5-397B-A17B (a native vision-language model). It uses a hybrid architecture (linear attention via Gated Delta Networks + sparse MoE), with 397B total parameters and 17B activated per forward pass for improved inference efficiency; strong results across reasoning, coding, agent capabilities, and multimodal understanding; language/dialect coverage expanded from 119 to 201. The hosted Qwen3.5-Plus on Alibaba Cloud Model Studio offers built-in tools/adaptive tool use and a 1M context window by default.

model_name: Doubao Large Model 2.0 / Seedance 2.0 / Seedream 5.0 Preview
features_zh: 字节跳动火山引擎在除夕夜发布豆包大模型 2.0，包含基础模型能力和企业级 Agent 功能的重大升级；同时发布 Seedance 2.0 音视频创作模型（支持文本/图片/音频/视频多模态输入，生成15秒带原生音频的高质量多镜头视频）和 Seedream 5.0 预览版图像创作模型。
features_en: ByteDance Volcano Engine launches Doubao Large Model 2.0 on Chinese New Year's Eve with major upgrades to foundational capabilities and enterprise agent functionalities; simultaneously releases Seedance 2.0 (multimodal audio-video creation, generating 15s multi-shot videos with native audio) and Seedream 5.0 Preview image model.

features_zh: 面向 Codex 的实时编码超低延迟模型（研究预览）；运行在 Cerebras WSE-3 芯片上，可达 1000+ tokens/s，比 GPT-5.3-Codex 快约15倍；128k 上下文、仅限文本输入；面向 ChatGPT Pro 用户通过 Codex app/CLI/VS Code 扩展逐步开放。
features_en: Ultra-fast low-latency real-time coding model for Codex (research preview); runs on Cerebras WSE-3 chip at 1000+ tokens/sec, ~15x faster than GPT-5.3-Codex; 128k context, text-only; rolling out to ChatGPT Pro users via Codex app/CLI/VS Code extension.

features_zh: Gemini 3 Deep Think 推理模式重大升级，面向科学/研究/工程难题；采用并行推理同时探索多种假设；在学术基准上表现优异（Humanity's Last Exam 48.4%，ARC-AGI-2 84.6%，Codeforces Elo 3455）；在 Gemini App 向 Google AI Ultra 订阅者开放，并首次通过 API 提供早期访问。
features_en: Major upgrade to Gemini 3 Deep Think reasoning mode for science, research, and engineering; parallel reasoning exploring multiple hypotheses; 48.4% Humanity's Last Exam, 84.6% ARC-AGI-2, Codeforces Elo 3455, gold-medal on IMO 2025. First available via Gemini API through early access program.

features_zh: 230B 总参数 MoE 架构（约 10B 激活），性能接近 GPT-5.2 和 Claude Opus 4.6，成本仅为后者的 1/20。在编程、工具调用与搜索、办公等场景达到 SOTA 表现，优化了复杂任务拆解与思考 token 消耗，任务处理速度显著提升。
features_en: 230B total MoE parameters (~10B active), performing comparably to GPT-5.2, Claude Opus 4.6, and Gemini 3 Pro at ~1/20th the cost of Claude Opus 4.6. Productivity-focused upgrade targeting SOTA performance in coding, tool-calling/search, and office workflows.

features_zh: 智谱AI新一代旗舰基座，面向 Agentic Engineering 设计。744B 参数 MoE（40B 激活），28.5T 预训练数据。完全基于华为昇腾芯片与 MindSpore 训练，集成 DeepSeek Sparse Attention。SWE-bench Verified 达 77.8%，权重以 MIT 许可开源。
features_en: ZhipuAI flagship: 744B total MoE parameters (40-44B active), 200K context, 28.5T tokens pretraining. Fully trained on Huawei Ascend chips with MindSpore framework using novel Slime async RL infrastructure. 77.8% SWE-bench Verified, MIT open-source.

features_zh: 提升回应风格与质量，使其更沉稳且贴合语境；对建议或操作类问题的输出更清晰，并能更可靠地前置显示关键信息。
features_en: An update to GPT-5.2 Instant improving response style and quality: more measured/grounded tone, better contextual adaptation, clearer answers for advice/how-to queries, and more reliably surfacing key information upfront.

features_zh: 统一图像生成与编辑模型，支持原生 2K 分辨率；专业排版渲染（PPT、海报、信息图等）；支持最长 1000 token 提示词；轻量 7B 架构。AI Arena 文生图评测全球第三。
features_en: Unified image generation and editing model with native 2K (2048x2048) resolution; professional typography rendering (slides, posters, infographics); supports up to 1,000-token prompts; lightweight 7B architecture. Ranked 3rd globally on AI Arena text-to-image evaluation.

features_zh: OpenAI 最强自主编程模型，结合 Codex 和 GPT-5 训练体系；比 GPT-5.2-Codex 快约25%；400K 上下文窗口；在 SWE-Bench Pro、Terminal-Bench 2.0 等评测上刷新行业高点；首个被 OpenAI 网络安全准备框架评定为高能力级别的模型。
features_en: OpenAI's most powerful agentic coding model combining Codex and GPT-5 training stacks; ~25% faster than GPT-5.2-Codex; 400K context (128K output); 77.3% Terminal-Bench 2.0, 81.4% SWE-Lancer IC Diamond. First model classified high capability for cybersecurity under OpenAI's Preparedness Framework.

features_zh: Anthropic 最强模型升级；首次为 Opus 级提供 1M token 上下文窗口（Beta）；ARC AGI 2 达 68.8%（近乎翻倍）；GDPval-AA 评测超 GPT-5.2 约 144 Elo。引入 Agent Teams（并行编排）、Effort Tuning、Compaction API 和自适应思维等功能。
features_en: Anthropic's smartest model; 1M token context (beta, first for Opus-class); 68.8% ARC AGI 2 (nearly doubles Opus 4.5's 37.6%); outperforms GPT-5.2 by ~144 Elo on GDPval-AA. Introduces Agent Teams, Effort Tuning, Compaction API, adaptive thinking.

features_zh: 发布两款语音转文本模型：Voxtral Mini Transcribe V2 支持批量转录、说话人分离和字级时间戳（13种语言）；Voxtral Realtime 面向实时应用，延迟低至亚 200 毫秒。采用 Apache 2.0 开源许可。
features_en: Two speech-to-text models: Voxtral Mini Transcribe V2 with batch transcription, speaker diarization, and word-level timestamps (13 languages); Voxtral Realtime for live applications with sub-200ms latency. Open weights under Apache 2.0.

features_zh: 轻量级复杂文档 OCR 模型（0.9B 参数），在公式、表格和信息抽取等文档理解任务上表现优异（如 OmniDocBench V1.5 指标）；支持 vLLM、SGLang 和 Ollama 部署；以 MIT 许可开源。
features_en: A lightweight (0.9B) OCR model for complex document understanding with SOTA results on document tasks (e.g., formulas/tables/information extraction; OmniDocBench V1.5 referenced in the model card); supports vLLM/SGLang/Ollama deployments; open-sourced under the MIT License.

features_zh: Gemini 3 Pro 预览版正式面向开发者开放，支持 Computer Use 工具调用，并在数学和代码任务上保持领先地位。
features_en: Gemini 3 Pro Preview available for developers, supporting Computer Use tool calls and maintaining leadership in math and coding tasks.

features_zh: 基于 K2-Base 预训练 15 万亿混合视觉和文本 token；1 万亿总参数 MoE（每 token 激活 32B），4 亿参数视觉编码器实现原生多模态；子智能体功能可并行调度最多 100 个子 Agent，速度提升 3-4.5 倍。
features_en: Continual pretraining on ~15T mixed vision-text tokens from K2-Base; 1T total MoE parameters (32B active/token) with 400M vision encoder for native multimodal; Subagents orchestrate up to 100 sub-agents for 3-4.5x speedup. Outperforms GPT-5.2, Claude 4.5 Opus.

features_zh: 业界最大开源图像 MoE 模型，80B 总参数（13B 激活）；原生自回归多模态架构统一图像理解与生成；支持先思考再编辑的思维链推理；涵盖 80+ 子任务；LMArena 全球图像编辑开源排名第一。
features_en: Industry's largest open-source image MoE model: 80B total (13B active); native autoregressive multimodal architecture unifying understanding and generation; 'think first, then edit' CoT reasoning; 80+ sub-tasks; distilled version needs only 8 sampling steps.

features_zh: 30B-A3B MoE 轻量混合思考模型，专为高效本地部署设计；在 SWE-bench Verified 和 τ²-Bench 上超越 GPT-OSS-20B，达到同级别开源 SOTA。
features_en: 30B-A3B MoE lightweight model for efficient local deployment; exceeded 1M Hugging Face downloads in two weeks; outperforms GPT-OSS-20B and Qwen3-30B-A3B-Thinking on SWE-bench Verified and τ²-Bench.

features_zh: Qwen3 系列视觉多模态版本发布，包含 8B/32B 及 Flash 版本；支持长视频理解和更强的 OCR 文本识别能力。
features_en: Visual multimodal versions of Qwen3 series released, including 8B/32B and Flash versions; supports long video understanding and enhanced OCR.

model_name: Wan 2.6 系列 (t2i / image / i2v / r2v / t2v)
features_zh: 万相系列创意生成模型重大更新：涵盖自定义尺寸文生图、混合图文编辑、带音频的图生视频、保持人脸声音的参考视频生成以及多镜头叙事文生视频。
features_en: Wanxiang creative model updates: wan2.6-t2i text-to-image, wan2.6-image generation+editing, wan2.6-i2v image-to-video with multi-shot+audio, wan2.6-r2v reference-to-video preserving appearance/voice, wan2.6-t2v text-to-video with multi-shot narrative.

features_zh: 混元翻译模型 1.5 版，提供 1.8B 和 7B 版本，支持 33 种语言及 5 种方言；具备术语干预、上下文翻译及格式化输出能力。
features_en: Hunyuan Machine Translation v1.5 in 1.8B and 7B variants, supporting 33 languages and 5 dialect variations; features terminology intervention, contextual translation, and formatted translation.

features_zh: 面向形式化数学推理的专用模型，支持 Lean 可验证证明代码；通过大规模 Agentic RL 提升推理效率，并公布了相关技术报告与证明资源。
features_en: Rolls out Seed Prover 1.5: a specialized model for formal mathematical reasoning with verifiable Lean proof code; improves capability and efficiency via large-scale agentic RL, with a released technical report and proof-code artifacts.

features_zh: 230B 总参数升级版；系统性增强多语言编程（Rust、Java、Go、C++ 等）、Web/App 开发、UI/UX 设计能力；复杂办公场景指令遵循增强，回复更简洁且 token 消耗更低。多语言编码性能超越 Claude Sonnet 4.5。
features_en: Major M2 upgrade, 230B total (~10B active); greatly enhanced multilingual programming (Rust, Java, Go, C++, Kotlin, etc.) and UI/UX design; better instruction-following for complex scenarios, more concise responses with lower token usage.

features_zh: 重点优化编码和编程场景的旗舰 LLM；在 Code Arena 评测平台上排名开源和国内模型双料第一；128K 上下文，兼容 vLLM/SGLang 等主流推理框架。
features_en: ZhipuAI new-generation flagship LLM optimized for coding; ranked #1 among open-source and domestic models on Code Arena (millions of users); 128K context, compatible with vLLM/SGLang inference frameworks.

features_zh: 先进自主编程模型，通过上下文压缩（compaction）改进长周期任务；在大型代码变更（重构/迁移）中表现更佳；强化了 Windows 支持和防御性网络安全能力。
features_en: Advanced agentic coding model with context compaction for long-horizon work; better at large code changes (refactors/migrations), improved Windows support, significantly stronger cybersecurity. 56.4% SWE-Bench Pro, 64% Terminal-Bench 2.0.

features_zh: 通用 Agent 模型，集搜索、代码与 GUI Agent 能力于一体，支持图文输入；提供三种思考模式以平衡延迟与推理深度；在检索、复杂指令遵循和 Agentic Coding 场景表现突出。
features_en: A generalized agentic model combining search, coding, and GUI-agent capabilities with image+text input; offers three thinking modes to balance latency and depth; highlights performance on realistic workflow evaluations.

features_zh: 以 Flash 级速度提供 Pro 级推理，成本不到 Pro 的 1/4；在视觉空间推理、代码执行等方面表现先进；SWE-bench Verified 达 78%，超越了许多 Pro 级模型。已设为 Gemini 应用默认模型。
features_en: Pro-grade reasoning at Flash-level speed, <1/4 cost of Gemini 3 Pro; surpasses Gemini 2.5 Pro on many benchmarks; advanced visual/spatial reasoning with code execution; 78% SWE-bench Verified (outperforming Gemini 3 Pro).

features_zh: 基于文本 TurboS 底座的图生文快思考模型，在图像基础识别与图像分析推理维度较上一版本有显著提升。
features_en: A new image-to-text fast-thinking model built from the TurboS text foundation, with improvements in basic image recognition and image analysis/reasoning vs. the prior version.

features_zh: 迄今最强专业知识工作模型系列。Instant（快速）、Thinking（深度推理）、Pro（研究级）。GDPval 达 70.9%（超越 44 个职业专家），SWE-Bench Verified 80%，GPQA Diamond 92.4%，AIME 2025 达 100%。
features_en: Most capable model series for professional knowledge work: Instant (fast), Thinking (deep reasoning), Pro (research-grade). 70.9% GDPval, 80% SWE-Bench Verified, 92.4% GPQA Diamond, 100% AIME 2025.

features_zh: 前沿代码 Agent 模型：Devstral 2（123B 稠密，256K 上下文，SWE-bench 72.2%），Devstral Small 2（24B，SWE-bench 68.0%）。自主工程能力匹敌闭源系统，成本降低约 85%。
features_en: Frontier code agent models: Devstral 2 (123B dense, 256K context, 72.2% SWE-bench), Devstral Small 2 (24B, 68.0% SWE-bench). Rivals proprietary systems at ~85% lower cost. Launched with Mistral Vibe CLI.

features_zh: 开源多模态大模型系列，支持 128k 上下文；首次强调原生多模态工具调用，支持将图像、文档等直接作为参数传递，打通了视觉感知到执行的闭环。
features_en: Open-source multimodal LLM series (GLM-4.6V 106B and GLM-4.6V-Flash 9B): 128k context; introduces native multimodal tool/function calling where images/docs can be passed directly as tool parameters.

features_zh: 腾讯下一代大模型，MoE 406B 总参数（32B 激活），256K 超长上下文。分为深度推理（Think）和通用对话（Instruct）双版本，在数学、科学、编码和指令遵循方面有显著提升。
features_en: Tencent's next-gen model, MoE 406B total (32B active), 256K context. Think (deep reasoning) and Instruct (general conversation) dual versions. 73.4 on IMO-AnswerBench, significant improvements in math/science/coding/instruction-following.

features_zh: 专业编程模型，SWE-Bench-Verified 达到 SOTA；256K 上下文窗口；成本比行业平均低 62.7%。擅长 Bug 修复、代码生成和前端开发。
features_en: ByteDance Volcano Engine's specialized coding model achieving SOTA on SWE-Bench-Verified; 256K context; 62.7% lower cost than industry average. Excels in bug fixing, code generation, and frontend development.

features_zh: Mistral 第三代模型：Large 3 为 675B 总参数 MoE，支持 256K 上下文，具备原生多模态能力；Ministral 3 家族主打同级最优性价比，全部采用 Apache 2.0 许可。
features_en: Mistral 3 generation: Large 3 is sparse MoE (41B active/675B total), 256K context, native multimodal, #2 on LMArena OSS non-reasoning. Ministral 3 family: 14B/8B/3B dense models with best cost-performance in class.

features_zh: 达到 GPT-5 级性能。V3.2 首次将推理直接集成到工具使用中（Thinking in Tool-Use）；V3.2-Speciale 推理能力极强，在竞赛中获金牌水平。引入 DSA 降低长上下文成本约 50%。
features_en: V3.2 achieves GPT-5 level, first model integrating reasoning into tool-use (1,800+ environments). V3.2-Speciale rivals Gemini-3.0-Pro with gold medals at IMO/CMO/ICPC/IOI 2025. Introduces DSA reducing long-context compute ~50%.

features_zh: 全球最佳编程模型、最强复杂 Agent 构建模型、最优计算机操控模型；编码/Agent/计算机使用 SOTA。在 SWE-bench 上达到 80.9%。
features_en: Anthropic's newest flagship - best coding model, strongest for complex agents, best at computer use; SOTA across coding/agents/computer use. 80.9% on SWE-bench.

features_zh: Qwen3 旗舰系列：Max 拥有 1T+ 参数 MoE，支持 1M 输入；Omni 为原生多模态，支持实时语音交互；QVQ-Max 专为高级逻辑推理和视觉感知分步解决设计。
features_en: Qwen3-Max: Flagship LLM with 1T+ MoE parameters, ~1M token input. Qwen3-Omni: Natively multimodal foundation model for real-time text/spoken responses. QVQ-Max: Purpose-built for advanced logical reasoning and step-by-step problem-solving.

features_zh: 腾讯混元视频生成模型升级版，进一步提升了视频生成的连贯性和质感，保持开源。
features_en: Upgraded version of Tencent's Hunyuan video generation model, further improving video coherence and texture; remains open source.

features_zh: 同类最佳工具调用模型，2M 上下文窗口；专为企业场景训练。配套推出 Agent Tools API，支持实时 X 数据访问、网络搜索及远程代码执行。
features_en: Best-in-class tool-calling model, 2M context; trained for enterprise use cases; 100% τ²-bench Telecom. Launched Agent Tools API (real-time X data, web search, remote code execution).

features_zh: 面向项目级长周期 Agentic 编码模型。通过 compaction 技术实现跨窗口连贯工作，单任务可处理数百万 tokens；增强了代码评审和长程任务能力。
features_en: A frontier agentic coding model for long-running, project-scale work; uses compaction to operate coherently across multiple context windows (millions of tokens in a single task); targets PR/code review/long-horizon tasks.

features_zh: Gemini 3 时代开启。具备强大的多模态推理能力（文本/图/影/码）；GPQA Diamond 91.9%，并在数学（MathArena Apex）和 Web 开发领域创下新纪录。
features_en: Google's most intelligent model. LMArena 1501, 37.5% Humanity's Last Exam, 91.9% GPQA Diamond, 23.4% MathArena Apex (new math SOTA), #1 WebDev Arena (1487 ELO).

features_zh: 对话更自然流畅，同时保持强推理。Thinking 变体在 LMArena 文本榜单排名第一。EQ-Bench3 情感智能第一，创意写作能力显著提升。
features_en: Thinking variant ranks #1 on LMArena Text (1483 Elo), Non-Thinking #2 (1465 Elo). Released after 2-week silent rollout; 64.78% preference in blind evals; #1 on EQ-Bench3.

features_zh: 发布超过 100 个模型，覆盖 0.5B 到 72B 参数；训练数据量达 18T tokens，全面提升了编码、数学和通用指令遵循能力。
features_en: Released over 100 open-source models ranging from 0.5B to 72B parameters; trained on 18T tokens, comprehensively improving coding and math capabilities.

features_zh: 第一代原生支持边思考边使用工具的 Thinking Agent。推理过程中可实时调用外部工具并根据反馈进行自主优化；是开源 AI 推理模型的重大突破。
features_en: First-generation Thinking Agent with native 'thinking while using tools'; calls external tools during reasoning rather than completing thinking first; supports real-time tool calling and autonomous optimization.

features_zh: Sora2 正式发布，用于生成短视频。
features_en: Sora2 officially launched for generating short videos.

features_zh: Claude Sonnet 4.5 是全球最佳编程模型，也是构建复杂智能体的最强模型和最优秀的计算机操控模型，在推理和数学方面取得了显著进步。
features_en: Claude Sonnet 4.5 is the best coding model in the world. It's the strongest model for building complex agents. It's the best model at using computers. And it shows substantial gains in reasoning and math.

features_zh: 前脚DeepSeek更新到了V3.2，现在智谱又更新了——正式推出GLM-4.6，代码能力直接推到了国内最强。
features_en: Right after DeepSeek updated to V3.2, ZhipuAI followed with the official release of GLM-4.6, pushing its coding capabilities to the top in China.

features_zh: 假期前一天发布，熟悉的节奏。
features_en: Released the day before a holiday — a familiar rhythm.

features_zh: Qwen3 全家桶发布。
features_en: Full Qwen3 model family released.

features_zh: 深度求索（DeepSeek）发布新模型 DeepSeek-V3.1-Terminus。本次升级基于 DeepSeek-V3.1，做出两项重大改进：1. 语言一致性：缓解中英文混杂、偶发异常字符等问题。2. Agent 能力：进一步优化 Code Agent 与 Search Agent 的表现。
features_en: DeepSeek released a new model: DeepSeek-V3.1-Terminus. Based on DeepSeek-V3.1, this upgrade brings two major improvements: 1. Language consistency: mitigates mixed Chinese-English text and occasional abnormal characters. 2. Agent capabilities: further optimized Code Agent and Search Agent performance.

features_zh: 推出通义 DeepResearch——首个性能全面对标 OpenAI DeepResearch 的开源 Web 智能体，在各项综合性基准测试中展现出 SOTA 水平。
features_en: Introducing Tongyi DeepResearch — the first open-source web agent that comprehensively matches OpenAI DeepResearch in performance, achieving SOTA-level results across various comprehensive benchmarks.

features_zh: Hunyuan-PromptEnhancer 是一款提示词重写工具，在保留原始意图的前提下重构输入提示词，生成更清晰、层次分明且逻辑一致的提示词，适用于下游图像生成等任务。
features_en: Hunyuan-PromptEnhancer is a prompt rewriting utility. It restructures an input prompt while preserving the original intent, producing clearer, layered, and logically consistent prompts suitable for downstream image generation or similar tasks.

features_zh: GPT-5-Codex 重点优化了在真实工程场景中的自主式（agentic）软件工程能力。它既能在短时间的交互式会话中快速响应，也能独立完成冗长复杂的任务。其代码审查能力可在代码上线前发现关键漏洞。
features_en: GPT-5-Codex focuses on autonomous (agentic) software engineering in real-world scenarios. It can respond quickly in short interactive sessions and independently complete lengthy, complex tasks. Its code review capabilities can catch critical vulnerabilities before code goes live.

features_zh: 开源发布。
features_en: Open-source release.

features_zh: DeepSeek-V3.1 是一种混合模型，支持思考模式和非思考模式。主要改进：1. 混合思考模式：通过改变聊天模板，一个模型即可支持思考与非思考模式。2. 更智能的工具调用：通过后训练优化，模型在工具使用和代理任务方面的性能显著提升。3. 更高的思考效率：DeepSeek-V3.1-Think 实现了与 DeepSeek-R1-0528 相当的答案质量，同时响应速度更快。
features_en: DeepSeek-V3.1 is a hybrid model supporting both thinking and non-thinking modes. Key improvements: 1. Hybrid thinking: a single model supports both modes via chat template switching. 2. Smarter tool calling: significantly improved tool use and agent task performance through post-training. 3. Higher thinking efficiency: DeepSeek-V3.1-Think achieves answer quality comparable to DeepSeek-R1-0528, with faster response times.

features_zh: GLM-4.5V 是智谱新一代基于 MoE 架构的视觉推理模型，以 106B 总参数量和 12B 激活参数量，在各类基准测试中达到全球同级别开源多模态模型 SOTA，涵盖图像、视频、文档理解及 GUI 任务等。
features_en: GLM-4.5V is ZhipuAI's next-generation MoE-based visual reasoning model. With 106B total parameters and 12B active parameters, it achieves global SOTA among comparable open-source multimodal models across image, video, document understanding, and GUI tasks.

features_zh: GPT-5 是一个一体化系统，包含三个核心部分：一个智能高效的基础模型，可解答大多数问题；一个深度推理模型（GPT-5 思维模块），用于处理更复杂的难题；以及一个实时路由模块，能够基于对话类型、问题复杂度、工具需求及用户显式指令智能调度模型。
features_en: GPT-5 is a unified system with three core components: an efficient base model for most questions, a deep reasoning model (GPT-5 thinking module) for complex problems, and a real-time routing module that intelligently dispatches models based on conversation type, problem complexity, tool requirements, and explicit user instructions.

features_zh: 开放权重推理模型（Apache 2.0 许可证）。gpt-oss-120b（117B 参数）和 gpt-oss-20b（21B 参数）。
features_en: Open-weight reasoning models (Apache 2.0 license). gpt-oss-120b (117B params) and gpt-oss-20b (21B params).

features_zh: Opus 4 的直接替代升级版，具备混合推理和扩展思考能力。
features_en: Drop-in replacement for Opus 4, with hybrid reasoning and extended thinking.

features_zh: 基础世界模型，可根据文本提示生成实时交互式 3D 环境。研究预览版。
features_en: Foundation world model that generates real-time interactive 3D environments from text prompts. Research preview.

features_zh: 混合推理模型，提供用于复杂推理和工具使用的思考模式，以及用于即时响应的非思考模式。
features_en: Hybrid reasoning model offering a thinking mode for complex reasoning and tool use, and a non-thinking mode for instant responses.

features_zh: 支持全球最长的上下文窗口，包括 100 万 tokens 输入、8 万 tokens 输出。强大的开源编程大语言模型，专注于代码问题解决。
features_en: Supports the world's longest context window with 1M tokens input and 80K tokens output. A strong open-source coding LLM for issue resolution.
